meanings.definition: Not dedicated or committed to a particular purpose or cause.
meanings.sent1: She was undedicated to any hobby and often switched interests.
meanings.sent2: The undedicated student rarely completed any tasks on time.
meanings.sent3: The undedicated chef kept changing the menu every day, confusing the customers.
meanings.sent4: His undedicated approach to work left a trail of unfinished projects behind him.
meanings.sent5: The undedicated gardener neglected the plants, causing them to wither away.

meanings.definition: Not devoted or loyal to a specific person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The undedicated employee frequently missed deadlines and meetings.
meanings.sent2: She was undedicated to her job and often called in sick without reason.
meanings.sent3: The undedicated pet owner forgot to feed the fish for days.
meanings.sent4: His undedicated attitude towards relationships led to frequent breakups.
meanings.sent5: The undedicated fan rarely attended the games, disappointing the team.
